<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class emits a version of the loop where run-time checks ensure</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that may-alias pointers can&#39;t overlap.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It currently only supports single-exit loops and assumes that the loop</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Expects LoopAccessInfo, Loop, LoopInfo, DominatorTree as input.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It uses runtime check provided by the user. If \\p UseLAIChecks is true,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// we will retain the default checks made by LAI. Otherwise, construct an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// object having no checks and we expect the user to add them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#ab781d1d60b8dba236c33dba9ae54e087">LoopVersioning</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopaccessinfo">LoopAccessInfo</a> &amp;LAI,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Performs the CFG manipulation part of versioning the loop including</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the DominatorTree and LoopInfo updates.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The loop that was used to construct the class will be the &quot;versioned&quot; loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// i.e. the loop that will receive control if all the memchecks pass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This allows the loop transform pass to operate on the same loop regardless</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of whether versioning was necessary or not:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    for each loop L:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        analyze L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        if versioning is necessary version L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        transform L</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689">versionLoop</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689">versionLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6880d6c7da94499220b6d7dfcc3c88d4">findDefsUsedOutsideOfLoop</a>(VersionedLoop)); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Same but if the client has already precomputed the set of values</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// used outside the loop, this API will allows passing that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the versioned loop.  Control flows here if pointers in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// loop don&#39;t alias (i.e. all memchecks passed).  (This loop is actually the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the fall-back loop.  Control flows here if pointers in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// loop may alias (i.e. one of the memchecks failed).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Expose LoopVersioning as a pass.  Currently this is only used for</Highlight></CodeLine>
